title: What to Watch This Week: 60+ Premieres, Finales and More

This week, you’ll find 21 premieres (including the debuts of Motorheads, She the People and […]

title: Georgie & Mandy Boss Talks Mary’s Big Bet on Georgie — Is There a Big Bang Twist We Didn’t See Coming?
description: Mary Cooper just took too big a risk for Georgie to fail. In Georgie & Mandy’s first season finale, Sheldon’s mother (played by recurring guest star Zoe Perry) put her house up as collateral so that her older son could secure a bank loan and buy McAllister Auto & Tire from his father-in-law Jim. “Honey, […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
